31#ifndef HB_DEPRECATED_H
32#define HB_DEPRECATED_H
33
34#include "hb-common.h"
35#include "hb-unicode.h"
36#include "hb-font.h"
37#include "hb-set.h"

39
40/**
41 * SECTION:hb-deprecated
42 * @title: hb-deprecated
43 * @short_description: Deprecated API
44 * @include: hb.h
45 *
46 * These API have been deprecated in favor of newer API, or because they
47 * were deemed unnecessary.
48 **/
49
50
51HB_BEGIN_DECLS
52
53#ifndef HB_DISABLE_DEPRECATED
54
55
56/**
57 * HB_SCRIPT_CANADIAN_ABORIGINAL:
58 *
59 * Use #HB_SCRIPT_CANADIAN_SYLLABICS instead:
60 *
61 * Deprecated: 0.9.20
62 */
63#define HB_SCRIPT_CANADIAN_ABORIGINAL HB_SCRIPT_CANADIAN_SYLLABICS
64
65/**
66 * HB_BUFFER_FLAGS_DEFAULT:
67 *
68 * Use #HB_BUFFER_FLAG_DEFAULT instead.
69 *
70 * Deprecated: 0.9.20
71 */
72#define HB_BUFFER_FLAGS_DEFAULT HB_BUFFER_FLAG_DEFAULT
73/**
74 * HB_BUFFER_SERIALIZE_FLAGS_DEFAULT:
75 *
76 * Use #HB_BUFFER_SERIALIZE_FLAG_DEFAULT instead.
77 *
78 * Deprecated: 0.9.20
79 */
80#define HB_BUFFER_SERIALIZE_FLAGS_DEFAULT HB_BUFFER_SERIALIZE_FLAG_DEFAULT
81
82/**
83 * hb_font_get_glyph_func_t:
84 * @font: #hb_font_t to work upon
85 * @font_data: @font user data pointer
86 * @unicode: The Unicode code point to query
87 * @variation_selector: The variation-selector code point to query
88 * @glyph: (out): The glyph ID retrieved
89 * @user_data: User data pointer passed by the caller
90 *
91 * A virtual method for the #hb_font_funcs_t of an #hb_font_t object.
92 *
93 * This method should retrieve the glyph ID for a specified Unicode code point
94 * font, with an optional variation selector.
95 *
96 * Return value: `true` if data found, `false` otherwise
97 * Deprecated: 1.2.3
98 *
99 **/
100typedef hb_bool_t (*hb_font_get_glyph_func_t) (hb_font_t *font, void *font_data,
101 hb_codepoint_t unicode, hb_codepoint_t variation_selector,
102 hb_codepoint_t *glyph,
103 void *user_data);
104
105HB_DEPRECATED_FOR (hb_font_funcs_set_nominal_glyph_func and hb_font_funcs_set_variation_glyph_func)
106HB_EXTERN void
107hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_func (hb_font_funcs_t *ffuncs,
108 hb_font_get_glyph_func_t func,
109 void *user_data, hb_destroy_func_t destroy);
110
111/**
112 * hb_unicode_eastasian_width_func_t:
113 * @ufuncs: A Unicode-functions structure
114 * @unicode: The code point to query
115 * @user_data: User data pointer passed by the caller
116 *
117 * A virtual method for the #hb_unicode_funcs_t structure.
118 *
119 * Deprecated: 2.0.0
120 */
121typedef unsigned int (*hb_unicode_eastasian_width_func_t) (hb_unicode_funcs_t *ufuncs,
122 hb_codepoint_t unicode,
123 void *user_data);
124
125/**
126 * hb_unicode_funcs_set_eastasian_width_func:
127 * @ufuncs: a Unicode-function structure
128 * @func: (closure user_data) (destroy destroy) (scope notified): The callback function to assign
129 * @user_data: Data to pass to @func
130 * @destroy: (nullable): The function to call when @user_data is not needed anymore
131 *
132 * Sets the implementation function for #hb_unicode_eastasian_width_func_t.
133 *
134 * Since: 0.9.2
135 * Deprecated: 2.0.0
136 **/
137HB_EXTERN HB_DEPRECATED void
138hb_unicode_funcs_set_eastasian_width_func (hb_unicode_funcs_t *ufuncs,
139 hb_unicode_eastasian_width_func_t func,
140 void *user_data, hb_destroy_func_t destroy);
141
142/**
143 * hb_unicode_eastasian_width:
144 * @ufuncs: a Unicode-function structure
145 * @unicode: The code point to query
146 *
147 * Don't use. Not used by HarfBuzz.
148 *
149 * Since: 0.9.2
150 * Deprecated: 2.0.0
151 **/
152HB_EXTERN HB_DEPRECATED unsigned int
153hb_unicode_eastasian_width (hb_unicode_funcs_t *ufuncs,
154 hb_codepoint_t unicode);
155
156
157/**
158 * hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility_func_t:
159 * @ufuncs: a Unicode function structure
160 * @u: codepoint to decompose
161 * @decomposed: address of codepoint array (of length #HB_UNICODE_MAX_DECOMPOSITION_LEN) to write decomposition into
162 * @user_data: user data pointer as passed to hb_unicode_funcs_set_decompose_compatibility_func()
163 *
164 * Fully decompose @u to its Unicode compatibility decomposition. The codepoints of the decomposition will be written to @decomposed.
165 * The complete length of the decomposition will be returned.
166 *
167 * If @u has no compatibility decomposition, zero should be returned.
168 *
169 * The Unicode standard guarantees that a buffer of length #HB_UNICODE_MAX_DECOMPOSITION_LEN codepoints will always be sufficient for any
170 * compatibility decomposition plus an terminating value of 0. Consequently, @decompose must be allocated by the caller to be at least this length. Implementations
171 * of this function type must ensure that they do not write past the provided array.
172 *
173 * Return value: number of codepoints in the full compatibility decomposition of @u, or 0 if no decomposition available.
174 *
175 * Deprecated: 2.0.0
176 */
177typedef unsigned int (*hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility_func_t) (hb_unicode_funcs_t *ufuncs,
178 hb_codepoint_t u,
179 hb_codepoint_t *decomposed,
180 void *user_data);
181
182/**
183 * HB_UNICODE_MAX_DECOMPOSITION_LEN:
184 *
185 * See Unicode 6.1 for details on the maximum decomposition length.
186 *
187 * Deprecated: 2.0.0
188 */
189#define HB_UNICODE_MAX_DECOMPOSITION_LEN (18+1) /* codepoints */
190
191/**
192 * hb_unicode_funcs_set_decompose_compatibility_func:
193 * @ufuncs: A Unicode-functions structure
194 * @func: (closure user_data) (destroy destroy) (scope notified): The callback function to assign
195 * @user_data: Data to pass to @func
196 * @destroy: (nullable): The function to call when @user_data is not needed anymore
197 *
198 * Sets the implementation function for #hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility_func_t.
199 *
200 *
201 *
202 * Since: 0.9.2
203 * Deprecated: 2.0.0
204 **/
205HB_EXTERN HB_DEPRECATED void
206hb_unicode_funcs_set_decompose_compatibility_func (hb_unicode_funcs_t *ufuncs,
207 hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility_func_t func,
208 void *user_data, hb_destroy_func_t destroy);
209
210HB_EXTERN HB_DEPRECATED unsigned int
211hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility (hb_unicode_funcs_t *ufuncs,
212 hb_codepoint_t u,
213 hb_codepoint_t *decomposed);
214
215
216/**
217 * hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning_func_t:
218 *
219 * A virtual method for the #hb_font_funcs_t of an #hb_font_t object.
220 *
221 * This method should retrieve the kerning-adjustment value for a glyph-pair in
222 * the specified font, for vertical text segments.
223 *
224 **/
225typedef hb_font_get_glyph_kerning_func_t hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning_func_t;
226
227/**
228 * hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_v_kerning_func:
229 * @ffuncs: A font-function structure
230 * @func: (closure user_data) (destroy destroy) (scope notified): The callback function to assign
231 * @user_data: Data to pass to @func
232 * @destroy: (nullable): The function to call when @user_data is not needed anymore
233 *
234 * Sets the implementation function for #hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning_func_t.
235 *
236 * Since: 0.9.2
237 * Deprecated: 2.0.0
238 **/
239HB_EXTERN void
240hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_v_kerning_func (hb_font_funcs_t *ffuncs,
241 hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning_func_t func,
242 void *user_data, hb_destroy_func_t destroy);
243
244HB_EXTERN hb_position_t
245hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning (hb_font_t *font,
246 hb_codepoint_t top_glyph, hb_codepoint_t bottom_glyph);
247
248#endif
249
250HB_END_DECLS
251
252#endif /* HB_DEPRECATED_H */
